RT @chiproytx Which is why Congress-folk hiding behind passing a Balanced Budget Amendment are full of it.  I‚Äôd support one - but that‚Äôs not the problem.  Congress is. https://twitter.com/repthomasmassie/status/1155113840016842753 QT @RepThomasMassie Some people mistakenly think that not raising the debt limit would necessarily cause a gov‚Äôt shutdown.

Not true.
